attributes.action: Sack all social workers involved in the tragic death of Baby P.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Baby P was allowed to die despite 60 visits from Haringey Social Services. 
This is completely unacceptable, and is a national disgrace.

ALL the social workers involved in the case of Baby P, including Sharon Shoesmith, Maria Ward and Gillie Christou should be sacked - and never allowed to work with children again.

I feel that Beverley Hughes, the Children's Minister, and Ed Balls, the Education Secretary, should ensure that those responsible are removed from their positions with immediate effect.

I also demand that the doctor and health visitor involved with Baby P, Dr Sabah Al-Zayyat and Paulette Thomas, should also lose their jobs. 

I call on the General Medical Council to ensure that this happens.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
